#!/bin/bash
# Bun App Installation Script
apt update && apt install -y git curl jq file unzip make gcc g++ python python-dev libtool
mkdir -p /mnt/server && cd /mnt/server

if [ "${USER_UPLOAD}" = "true" ] || [ "${USER_UPLOAD}" = "1" ]; then
    echo "☝️ User-uploaded files detected. Skipping installation steps."
    exit 0
fi

case ${GIT_ADDRESS} in
  *.git) ;;
  *) GIT_ADDRESS=${GIT_ADDRESS}.git ;;
esac

if [ -n "${USERNAME}" ] && [ -n "${ACCESS_TOKEN}" ]; then
    GIT_ADDRESS="https://${USERNAME}:${ACCESS_TOKEN}@$(echo ${GIT_ADDRESS} | cut -d/ -f3-)"
else
    echo "Using anonymous Git access"
fi

if [ "$(ls -A /mnt/server)" ]; then
    if [ -d .git ] && [ -f .git/config ]; then
        ORIGIN=$(git config --get remote.origin.url)
        if [ "${ORIGIN}" = "${GIT_ADDRESS}" ]; then git pull; fi
    else
        echo "/mnt/server not empty, skipping clone to avoid breakage"
    fi
else
    if [ -z "${BRANCH}" ]; then
        git clone ${GIT_ADDRESS} .
    else
        git clone --single-branch --branch ${BRANCH} ${GIT_ADDRESS} .
    fi
fi

if [ -n "${BUN_PACKAGES}" ]; then bun install ${BUN_PACKAGES}; fi
if [ -f /mnt/server/package.json ]; then bun install --production; fi

echo "-----------------------------------------"
echo "Installation completed..."
echo "-----------------------------------------"
